info.title: Frank Bot
info.description: Sean's personal assistant API. Full RESTful interface for calendar, contacts, SMS, Telegram, Swarm check-ins, Earshot transcripts, Android phone automation, autonomous tasks (jorbs), Claudia codebase agent, scripting engine, and system diagnostics.

get.description: Get events from Google Calendar. Filter by day, time range, or calendar. Defaults to today if no time filter specified.

post.description: Create event on Google Calendar. Attendees validated against contacts. Tagged as Frank_Bot-created.

patch.description: Update a Frank_Bot-created event. Only Frank_Bot events can be modified.

get.summary: Search contacts by name, email, or phone

post.description: Send SMS via Telnyx. Recipient can be a contact name or E.164 phone number.

get.summary: Get Telegram messages from a chat

post.summary: Send a photo via Telegram (personal account)

post.description: Ask a natural language question about transcripts in a date range.

get.summary: Parse natural language date to range
get.description: Convert 'last week', 'January 2026', etc. to YYYY-MM-DD range.

get.summary: Phone connection status and device info
Get current screen (screenshot + UI tree + clickable elements)

post.summary: Press a key (home, back, enter, etc.)
Find UI element by text and tap it

post.description: Async task. Returns task_id immediately. LLM autonomously drives the phone UI.

get.summary: Get thermostat status (via Google Home LLM automation)

post.summary: Check for and install app updates

post.description: Start a jorb. The LLM autonomously executes the plan using frank_bot capabilities.

post.summary: Approve or reject a jorb action
Send a message in a chat
Generate a new prompt from a completed chat

get.summary: Get execution details (output, git diff, costs)

post.description: Run ad-hoc code without saving. Must define main(frank).

get.summary: Get script task status and result
Current time (derives timezone from latest Swarm check-in)
